WorkItem.Description:
Compute the potential surface area of the panels based on the total area of the plot minus set-backs (internal buffer) minus some fraction of the area that would be lost to walking and equipment areas (~5%?)
Â 
The tool must use the setback tool to get the polygon. (use the intents framework)
The tool must have an input that is the lost area for equipment (Perhaps many inputs for paths, buildings, roads, equipment...)
The tool must post this figure in the scorecard
WorkItem.Summary: Calculate the available SQFT of panel space
